name: Juxtaposed Crazy Lines
description:
Juxtaposed Crazy Lines is a side scrolling game with a heavy focus on conveying emotions through colour and music. Players will lose themselves in the layers of Pollock Esq lines trying to avoid some obstacles and pass through others in order to progress the story of emotions.

The story is inspired by my own struggles and is conveyed heavily through the changes of colour as the player progresses, regresses and gets stuck ramming into the same wall over and over again.

Made for a uni project to synthesize the Atari game Barnstorming with the artist Jackson Pollock

Controls:

Up (W or Up-Arrow) and Down (S or Down-Arrow)
